name: pocketdungeon
description:
My take on a dungeon crawler using twine.

I have been developing this game for a while now and it is at the stage where it needs human feedback and testing.

Let me know if you find any bugs or improvements.

*Does not work on mobile*

What's new since first release:

          Added healing in battle properly (it now takes a turn to heal)

          Improved format of shop and pricing, as well as gold selling system

          New enemy and area to explore for continued gameplay

          Ability to save and load your game
